summary.para: Describes the subresources of a texture that are accessible from a depth-stencil view.

remarks.para: These are valid formats for a depth-stencil view:
A depth-stencil view can't use a typeless format. If the format chosen is DXGI_FORMAT_UNKNOWN, the format of the parent resource is used.
Pass a depth-stencil-view description into to create a depth-stencil view.

summary.para: A -typed value that specifies the viewing format. For allowable formats, see Remarks.
A -typed value that specifies how the depth-stencil resource will be accessed. This member also determines which _DSV to use in the following union.

A combination of enumeration constants that are combined by using a bitwise OR operation. The resulting value specifies whether the texture is read only. Pass 0 to specify that it isn't read only; otherwise, pass one or more of the members of the D3D12_DSV_FLAGS enumerated type.
A structure that specifies a 1D texture subresource.
A structure that specifies an array of 1D texture subresources.
A structure that specifies a 2D texture subresource.
A structure that specifies an array of 2D texture subresources.
A structure that specifies a multisampled 2D texture.
A structure that specifies an array of multisampled 2D textures.
